Reviews.Content: wife stayed nights july edward lear moved hotel moved day tired edward lear location hotels reasonably priced hotels staff friendly staff hotels londons easy maneuver dont require staff hotel indeed quaint outside inside dilapidated utterly dingy approaching dirty dont mind walking flights stairs friendly staff help bit halls filled dirty laundry cleaning day finally breakfast indeed hardy poor coffee weak rest food inedible enjoy time london avoid lear
